mapper.insert: insert into sys_button (id, title, name, icon, method_name, method_param, size, type, css, menu_id, remake, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time, enabled, menu_type, sort) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{methodParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{css,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remake,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, #{menuType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update sys_button
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method_name = #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method_param = #{methodParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
size = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
css = #{css,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remake = #{remake,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT},
menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_button set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method_name = #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method_param = #{methodParam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, css = #{css,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remake = #{remake,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=BIT}, menu_type = #{menuType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT b.id, b.title, b.`name`, b.icon, b.method_name, b.method_param, b.size, b.type, b.css, b.menu_id, b.remake, b.created_by, b.created_time, b.updated_by, b.updated_time, b.enabled, b.menu_type, b.sort from sys_button b left join sys_roule r on b.id=r.control_id where r.roule_id=#{merchantNo} and r.type=2 order by b.menu_id asc ,b.menu_type asc,b.sort asc

SELECT b.id, b.title, b.`name`, b.icon, b.method_name, b.method_param, b.size, b.type, b.css, b.menu_id, b.remake, b.created_by, b.created_time, b.updated_by, b.updated_time, b.enabled, b.menu_type, b.sort from sys_button b left join sys_roule r on b.id=r.control_id where r.type=2 and r.user_id=#{userId} and b.menu_id=#{menuId} order by b.menu_id asc ,b.menu_type asc,b.sort asc
